<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 177 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Champion](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=230)

**Prerequisites**
[Champion Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6196)

</column>

---

You can gain and use the champion’s reaction associated with your [cause](Causes.aspx).
